about_the_game:
Harvey S. is a young man trying to hold on to life in his new city. Harvey S., who is good with computers, has set his mind to work as a "Freelance" on the internet. However, since there is not much experience in this field, the income level is low for now. That's why he needs to develop himself and create more income paths. There are many sites and methods to earn more income. This young man, who buys his bills, personal needs, household goods, computer parts and much more with the money he earns, is trying to build his own career ladder one by one.


- Computer programs are divided into three as business, entertainment and tools. You can purchase and download these programs from the internet.
- There are more than 40 websites. These sites are different from each other and they have advantages and disadvantages. Some of them can be scammers so you should be careful!


- Your character has a number of needs in order to survive.
- You can use your phone for social media, GPS or games.


You can do many hacks on the laptop, but it is very risky. If the character wishes, he can infiltrate another computer, server or bank's database. The greater the risk, the greater the amount of money. In addition, he can open a sales site of his own on the deep web and earn money from it. In short, the laptop is the dark side.


There are many shops, activities and dark vendors in the city. In the city, you can find shops and activities by car, and dark vendors by walking.
detailed_description:
Harvey S. is a young man trying to hold on to life in his new city. Harvey S., who is good with computers, has set his mind to work as a "Freelance" on the internet. However, since there is not much experience in this field, the income level is low for now. That's why he needs to develop himself and create more income paths. There are many sites and methods to earn more income. This young man, who buys his bills, personal needs, household goods, computer parts and much more with the money he earns, is trying to build his own career ladder one by one.


- Computer programs are divided into three as business, entertainment and tools. You can purchase and download these programs from the internet.
- There are more than 40 websites. These sites are different from each other and they have advantages and disadvantages. Some of them can be scammers so you should be careful!


- Your character has a number of needs in order to survive.
- You can use your phone for social media, GPS or games.


You can do many hacks on the laptop, but it is very risky. If the character wishes, he can infiltrate another computer, server or bank's database. The greater the risk, the greater the amount of money. In addition, he can open a sales site of his own on the deep web and earn money from it. In short, the laptop is the dark side.


There are many shops, activities and dark vendors in the city. In the city, you can find shops and activities by car, and dark vendors by walking.
name: Freelancer Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: You earn money by doing various kinds of work that you receive as a "Freelance" over the computer. With the money you earn, you can customize the house, improve yourself, have fun and more.
